alert.note: Alert for Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dewey County through 600 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Laplant, or 28 miles northeast of Eagle Butte, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tiospaye Topa School around 535 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
